Articles.Content:
This is probably a texture glitch, that makes this area look like a parallelogram-shaped lake. (from the angles I took the screenshots it looks like a square) It counts as the "surface" biome though, and ou can drive on it. There's even rocks on it, like on the normal surface. I just wanted to share this little "anomaly" with you. Have you ever found anything similar?

Javascript is disabled. View full album
That's pretty cool . It's probably just a texture glitch

Looks like one of the squares that make of the surface of Eve has gone missing (yes, squares; there was a really interesting bit in a video a while back about how Squad render the planets)

Do you have the coordinates for that? It would be interesting to see if that exists beyond just your installation of the game.

I've never encountered anything exactly like it, but I've come across places where regular-shaped cracks in the terrain exist through which Kerbals and vehicles can be pushed (with a few glitchy side effects, of course), although that's more of a case of missing terrain rather than invisible ground

EDIT: Didn't notice that the thread was micro-necro'd
